attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Due to the level of council tax the majority of the residents in this block will not be able to work unless they are earning over £22,000 per year.  This fact would make it very difficult for myself and neighbors trying to survive on very low incomes. Most will not be able to afford to return to work.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Lower Council Tax."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page11653.asp

Prime Minister's Office
